testsuite.name: com.test.flyBot.helper.requestor.specClass

testcase.name: (1) Request is made with a valid bank account of Austria
(2) Request is made with a valid bank account of Germany
(3) Request is made with a valid bank account of Switzerland
(4) Request is made with a valid bank account of Finland
(5) Request is made with a valid bank account of Sweden
(6) Request is made with a valid bank account of Norway
(7) Request is made with a valid bank account of Denmark
(8) Request is made with a valid bank account of non supported countries
(9) Request is made with an invalid bank account
Request is made with short (<7) length
Request is made with long (>34) length
